name: Crab Isle (Jakub_Vojak)
description:
This game was made in around 72 hours for MiniJam 108: Seaside with Limitation Everything dies in one hit!

Main Developer, programmer, artist and animator: ewe (me!)

Artist and Concept Artist: qwq (Mell)

Everything you need to know is disclosed in the game!

*Once you selected a name, you cannot change it again!!! This is due to how leaderboards work, thank you for understanding*

Royalty free music from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com
